attributes.action: Stop the Government increasing the cost of living
attributes.additional_details: The Government should take action on this and stop raising the cost of living or we are going to see more and more hardworking British families loosing their homes and also not being able to heat their homes or feed their families and it's time it stops
attributes.background: I want government to stop raising the cost of living because so many British families are struggling to keep their homes warm and put food on the table and it's not acceptable

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about the cost of living, but we are not sure what specific action you'd like Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out what specific action you'd like.
